channel.title: homepage on Tianhao Zhao
channel.description: Recent content in homepage on Tianhao Zhao

item.title: Marginalization of multivariate Markov chains
item.author: tianhao.zhao@emory.edu (Tianhao Zhao)
item.description: Discusses the marginalization operation of a multivariate Markov chain.

item.title: Non-linear Phillips curve in NK model step-by-step
item.author: tianhao.zhao@emory.edu (Tianhao Zhao)
item.description: Derives the non-linear Phillips curve in NK models with Rotemberg price rigidity step by step. Helpful for students.

item.title: Multivariate case for Young (2010) non-stochastic simulation
item.author: tianhao.zhao@emory.edu (Tianhao Zhao)
item.description: Explains how to implement the multivariate case of Young (2010) non-stochastic simulation algorithm.

item.title: MultivariateMarkovChains.jl
item.author: tianhao.zhao@emory.edu (Tianhao Zhao)
item.description: This package provides types and methods for modeling vector-valued Markov chains in discrete time. It is useful for dynamic macroeconomic models and generic stochastic analysis. Project link: github.com/Clpr/MultivariateMarkovChain.jl

item.title: Blowfish: One cover picture for all posts
item.author: tianhao.zhao@emory.edu (Tianhao Zhao)
item.description: Shows how to specify cover/thumbnail picture for each post using assets without duplicate copies.

item.title: AdaptiveSG.jl
item.author: tianhao.zhao@emory.edu (Tianhao Zhao)
item.description: This package provides object-oriented API to define, train, evaluate and adapt multi-linear Adaptive Sparse Grid (ASG) interpolations. Project link: github.com/Clpr/AdaptiveSG.jl

item.title: Advanced Macroeconomics (Session 1)
item.author: tianhao.zhao@emory.edu (Tianhao Zhao)
item.description: Spring 2025, Beihang University. Seesion: Introduction to continuous time macroeconomics

item.title: BoxDomains.jl
item.author: tianhao.zhao@emory.edu (Tianhao Zhao)
item.description: A Julia implementation of box domains like [a1,b1]*[a2,b2]…. which are everywhere in economic modeling. The package allows users to define, manipulate, slice, transform, and discretize such spaces. In particular, most of the operations overload Julia Base such that users can have a native coding experience. Project URL: https://github.com/Clpr/BoxDomains.jl

item.title: ConstrainedSimplexSearch.jl
item.author: tianhao.zhao@emory.edu (Tianhao Zhao)
item.description: This repository implements the Constrained Nelder-Mead (simplex) Search algorithm. It handles generic non-linear equality and inequality constraints using penalty which guides the simplex to move towards the admissible space. Project URL: https://github.com/Clpr/ConstrainedSimplexSearch.jl

item.title: CountyPlus
item.author: tianhao.zhao@emory.edu (Tianhao Zhao)
item.description: CountyPlus is an open-source panel dataset that covers 3000+ U.S. counties from 2003 to 2019.This dataset estimates household consumption, measure of local financial friction, and measure of local nominal friction (Downward Nominal Wage Rigidity). Project URL: https://github.com/Clpr/CountyPlus
